title: Farnborough looks forward (1957)
brief_description: A survey of the aeroplanes on exhibition at the 1957 Farnborough Air Show featuring some of the latest developments in British aircraft design. Missiles on display included the Thunderbird, Bloodhound, Sea Slug and Firestreak; new aircraft - the Fairy Delta 2 capable of reaching a speed of 1100 mph.
